# UIControl.ContentVerticalAlignment

**Enumeration**

Constants for specifying the vertical alignment of content (text and images) in a control.

## Declaration

```swift
enum ContentVerticalAlignment
```

## Overview

You use these constants as the value of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIControl/contentVerticalAlignment-swift.property] property.

## Constants

- **UIControl.ContentVerticalAlignment.center**: Aligns the content vertically in the center of the control.
- **UIControl.ContentVerticalAlignment.top**: Aligns the content vertically at the top in the control (the default).
- **UIControl.ContentVerticalAlignment.bottom**: Aligns the content vertically at the bottom in the control.
- **UIControl.ContentVerticalAlignment.fill**: Aligns the content vertically to fill the content rectangle; images may be stretched.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Specifying content alignment

- **contentVerticalAlignment**: The vertical alignment of content within the control’s bounds.
- **contentHorizontalAlignment**: The horizontal alignment of content within the control’s bounds.
- **effectiveContentHorizontalAlignment**: The horizontal alignment currently in effect for the control.
- **UIControl.ContentHorizontalAlignment**: The horizontal alignment of content (text and images) within a control.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
